issue.title: [C++] Add regular logging of exec plan performance metrics
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15062](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15062). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This would simply log, on some configurable interval, the bytes allocated in the memory pool used by the exec plan and also the RSS of the process if that is easily and cheaply obtained.
